title: Arbor’s Lost Video: Bear Mountain
description:
Sometimes the footage gets misplaced but as long as we find it and get it out to all of you, we’re all good. In this “the lost” Arbor video of Bear Mountain you can check out Danny Thomas, Patrick Reddy, Joe Bosler and Forrest Schmidt shredding The Park! Special thanks goes out to Bear Mountain, Big Bear Vacations and of course our filmer/editor, Nate Shute.
Check out Arbor everywhere:
arborcollective.com
